mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, real_name, pass_word, salt, email, state, login_times, last_login_date, create_date, creator, modifier, modify_date from t_user where user_name = #{username}
select user_id, user_name, real_name, email, state, login_times from t_user order by user_id asc, create_date desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (user_name, real_name, pass_word, salt, email, state, create_date, creator, modify_date, modifier) VALUES (#{username}, #{realname}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{email}, #{state}, now(), 'system', now(), 'system')
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user SET user_name = #{username}, real_name = #{realname}, email=#{email}, state = #{state}, modifier = "system", modify_date = now() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
